text: Ana hu'negu huno Monafi sondia vahe'mokizmi Ra Anumzamo'a amanage huno hu'ne. Vahemo'zama e'inahu kema nehaza agafare Jeremaiaga kagipi Nagra nanekeni'a antesanugenka huama nehanankeno, kagipintira teve nefakna huno atiramino, tevema teaza huno ana vahera tesige'za akrukru hu'za teveregahaze.
